document_data.caption: A map showing Antoumek on the southern shore of the Lake of Mists.
document_data.name: Antoumek
document_data.mainbody: '''Antoumek''' was a small town located along the shores of the [[Lake of Mists]] in the [[Hordelands]] in the mid-to-late 14{{th}} century [[DR]].{{Cite interactive atlas}}
document_data.Geography: Antoumek sat along the southern shore of the Lake of Mists in between [[Almorel]] to the east and [[Strelsi]] to the west. It was located approximately {{SI|30|mi|k|long=yes}} north of the [[Golden Way]].
